question: What's the delivery time to Ranchi for 100 MT?

retrieved_documents.title: Delivery times and logistics
retrieved_documents.text: Delivery time to Ranchi: 5-7 business days for orders up to 200 MT. Express delivery available for 3-4 days at additional cost.
